00034 namespace uvm {
00035 
00036 class uvm_component;
00037 
00038 typedef std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *> rsrc_map_type;
00039 typedef std::map<std::string, rsrc_map_type*>           rsrc_cntxt_map_type;
00040 
00041 static rsrc_cntxt_map_type m_rsrc_cntxt_map;
00042 
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00047 template<typename T>
00048 class uvm_config_db :  public uvm_resource_db<T>
00049 {
00050 public:
00051 
00052     typedef uvm_resource<T> rsrc_t;
00053 
00054     uvm_config_db() : uvm_resource<T>() {}
00055     ~uvm_config_db() {}
00056 
00057     static bool get(uvm_component*    cntxt,
00058                     const std::string inst_name,
00059                     const std::string field_name,
00060                     T                 &value)
00061     {
00062         std::string cntxt_str;
00063 
00064         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00065             cntxt_str = "";
00066         else
00067             cntxt_str = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00068         
00069         return get(cntxt_str, inst_name, field_name, value);
00070 
00071     }
00072 
00073     static bool get(const std::string cntxt,
00074                     const std::string inst_name,
00075                     const std::string field_name,
00076                     T                 &value)
00077     {
00078         std::string         scope;
00079         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00080         resource_q          rsrc_q;
00081         rsrc_t            * rsrc;
00082         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base = NULL;
00083 
00084         scope = cntxt;
00085         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00086             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00087 
00088         rsrc_q    = rpool->lookup_regex(scope, field_name, typeid(T));
00089         rsrc_base = rpool->get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);
00090         rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_t*>(rsrc_base);
00091 
00092         if (rsrc == NULL)
00093         {
00094             return 0;
00095         }
00096         else
00097         {
00098             value = rsrc->read();
00099             return 1;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     static void set(uvm_component *   cntxt,
00104                     const std::string inst_name,
00105                     const std::string field_name,
00106                     const T &         value)
00107     {
00108         std::string cntxt_str;
00109 
00110         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00111             cntxt_str = "*";
00112         else
00113             cntxt_str = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00114 
00115         set(cntxt_str, inst_name, field_name, value);
00116     }
00117 
00118 
00119     static void set(const std::string cntxt,
00120                     const std::string inst_name,
00121                     const std::string field_name,
00122                     const T &         value)
00123     {
00124         std::string         scope;
00125         rsrc_map_type     * rsrc_map;
00126         rsrc_t            * rsrc = NULL;
00127         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base;
00128         std::string         rsrc_key;
00129         uvm_phase         * curr_phase = uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_common_schedule()->get_current_phase();
00130         std::pair <std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator, std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator> mit;
00131 
00132         if (cntxt.compare("") == 0) 
00133             scope = ".*";
00134         else 
00135             scope = cntxt;
00136 
00137         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00138             scope = cntxt +  "." + inst_name;
00139 
00140         if (m_rsrc_cntxt_map.find(cntxt) != m_rsrc_cntxt_map.end())
00141             rsrc_map = m_rsrc_cntxt_map[cntxt];
00142         else
00143             rsrc_map = new rsrc_map_type();
00144 
00145         rsrc_key = inst_name + "." + field_name;
00146 
00147         mit = rsrc_map->equal_range(rsrc_key);
00148         std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator it = mit.first;
00149         while ((it != mit.second) && (rsrc == NULL))
00150         {
00151             rsrc_base = it->second;
00152             rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_t*>(rsrc_base);
00153             it++;
00154         }
00155 
00156         if (rsrc == NULL)
00157         {
00158             rsrc = new rsrc_t(field_name, scope);
00159             rsrc_map->insert(std::pair<std::string, uvm_resource_base*>(rsrc_key, rsrc));
00160         }
00161 
00162         if ( (curr_phase != NULL) && (curr_phase->get_name().compare("build") == 0))
00163             rsrc->set_precedence(uvm_resource_base::m_default_precedence - get_depth(cntxt));
00164         else
00165             rsrc->set_precedence(uvm_resource_base::m_default_precedence);
00166 
00167         rsrc->write(value);
00168         rsrc->set_override();
00169 
00170         uvm_config_callback(cntxt, inst_name, field_name, rsrc);
00171     }
00172 
00173     static bool exists(uvm_component * cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name)
00174     {
00175         std::string scope;
00176 
00177         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00178             scope = "";
00179         else
00180             scope = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00181 
00182         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00183             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00184 
00185         return uvm_resource_db<T>::exists(scope, field_name);
00186     }
00187 
00188     static void wait_modified(uvm_component * cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name)
00189     {
00190         rsrc_t      * rsrc;
00191         std::string   scope;
00192 
00193         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00194             scope = "";
00195         else
00196             scope = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00197 
00198         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00199             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00200 
00201         rsrc = uvm_resource_db<T>::get_by_name_regex(scope, field_name); 
00202 
00203         if (rsrc == NULL)
00204         {
00205             std::cout << "uvm_config_db::wait_modified() Resource not found (" 
00206                       << scope 
00207                       << "." 
00208                       << field_name
00209                       << ")\n";
00210         }
00211         else
00212         {
00213             rsrc->wait_modified();
00214         }
00215 
00216     }
00217 
00218     static unsigned int get_depth(std::string cntxt)
00219     {
00220         return std::count(cntxt.begin(), cntxt.end(), '.');    
00221     }
00222 
00223 
00224 private:
00225 
00226 };

00228 template <typename T> 
00229 void uvm_set_config_int(
00230   const std::string& instname,
00231   const std::string& field,
00232   const T& val
00233 ) {
00234   sc_dt::sc_bv<4096> bv = uvm_convert_to_bv(val);
00235   uvm_config_db<sc_dt::sc_bv<4096> >::set(0, instname, field, val);
00236 }
